knimeNode.name: Feature Node
knimeNode.shortDescription: Calculate features of an image or labeling.

fullDescription.intro:
Calculate features of an image, labeling or an image under consideration of a given labeling.
Add as many feature sets as you want to the selected feature set panel. Some feature sets need some input parameters set. Once you have added a feature set you can set the missing input parameters in the feature selection panel.
fullDescription.option: Select the image column on which the features should be computed.
Select the image column on which the features should be computed.
Select the feature set to compute and add it with the "Add" button

ports.inPort: Input table with at least one image or one labeling column.
ports.outPort: Input table with computed feature sets appended.
